We investigated the influence of individual taxonomic groups on any functional shifts by analysing the relationship between shifts in abundance and trait values. Trends in relative abundance for each taxon were calculated following the same procedure applied above to analyse CWM changes, that is by calculating the bootstrapped mean of linear trends and applying LMM, but here using the relative abundance of each genus as a response variable instead of CWM.
